summary: The module implements a training pipeline for textual inversion, allowing users to learn new token embeddings from image‑text data using diffusion models (e.g., Stable Diffusion). It defines a dataset abstraction for handling image‑text pairs, integrates Accelerate for distributed training, leverages ONNX Runtime optimizations, and provides utilities for checkpointing, model‑card generation, and progress saving.
business_intent: To provide a ready‑to‑use solution for researchers and developers to extend text‑to‑image models with custom concepts, accelerating training with ONNX Runtime and simplifying model management and deployment.
